messages.subject: fulltime travelling unschooling family
messages.msgSnippet: hi everyone, we are a travelling family hoping to meet other unschoolers while on the road. we are on our way from houston to columbus, ohio tomorrow. we will
messages.messageBody:
hi everyone,
we are a travelling family hoping to meet other unschoolers while on
the road. we are on our way from houston to columbus, ohio tomorrow.
we will be there for 6 weeks. we travel in our rv for my huband's
job. our 2 boys are 1 and 5 but are used to playing with kids of all
ages. we have been travelling all over the usa for 4 years and love
it.

please email me directly if you want to befriend some strangers in
columbus.

warmly,
tara weed
